summary: This is a service request form from August 22, 2019, for the Federal Bureau of Prisons (FBOP) Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, requesting a quote for surveillance system equipment including decoders and spare drives. It indicates a priority service request for installation of a new Nice Vision system.

persons.name: Jeff Cranor
persons.context: Assigned to handle the service request for surveillance equipment at the MCC New York facility.

persons.name: Jeff McKenzie
persons.context: Assigned alongside Jeff Cranor and Justin Houston to handle the service request.

persons.name: Justin Houston
persons.context: Assigned to provide a quote to the customer for surveillance equipment including decoders and spare drives.

events.title: Service request for surveillance equipment quote
events.description: A priority service request is created for the FBOP MCC New York to obtain a quote for 20 decoders, spare storage drives, and OS drives for a Nice Vision surveillance system installation.

keyFacts: The document is a service request form dated August 22, 2019, for the Federal Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
It requests a quote for surveillance system equipment including 20 decoders, spare storage drives, and OS drives for a Nice Vision system installation.
The request is marked as a priority and indicates the system is not under warranty, with the problem discovered on the same day.
The service location is the MCC New York at 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007.
The document references a related service request number EFTA00117590.
